          <title>
            <string language="en">Falling off from a spinning Earth</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fallen weg von einer spinnenden Masse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tomber hors fonction d'une terre de rotation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Queda fora de uma terra girando</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cadendo fuori da una terra di filatura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Να πέσει μακριά από μια περιστρεφόμενη γη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El caer apagado de una tierra que hace girar</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration depicts an imaginary situation wherein if the Earth spun faster and faster, everything on it will fall off.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">falling off</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gravity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rotation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">spinning</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung stellt eine eingebildete Situation
worin bildlich dar, wenn die Masse schneller und, die schneller, alles
auf ihr gesponnen wird, herunterfällt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration dépeint une situation 
imaginaire où si la terre tournait plus rapidement et plus 
rapidement, tout là-dessus tombera .</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração descreve uma situação 
imaginária wherein se a terra girada mais rapidamente e mais 
rapidamente, tudo nela cair.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione descrive una situazione 
immaginaria in cui se la terra filata più velocemente e più 
velocemente, tutto su esso cadrà da.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση απεικονίζει μια φανταστική 
κατάσταση όπου εάν η γη περιέστρεψε γρηγορότερα και γρηγορότερα,
όλα σε την θα πέσουν μακριά.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración representa una situación 
imaginaria en donde si la tierra hizo girar más rápidamente y más 
rápidamente, todo en ella se caerá.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-de">herunterfallen</string>
